DevSpeak #28 | Behind barriers and solutions proposed by micro-services

Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Wesley Williams and Lucas Santos8 Jan 2101:31:46

Developers Wesley Willians and Lucas Santos were invited to this Faladev to have a conversation about what are microservices and what are the challenges and barriers to their application.

In this edition, Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista guide the conversation raising relevant topics and questions about the subject.
